'''''Amon Hen'' 169''' is the one-hundred-and-sixty-ninth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in May [[2001]].

** By: [[Sumner Gary Hunnewell|Gary Hunnewell]]
